title: Evolutionary biology

sections.title: Phylogenetic Trees
goals: The student will be able to define and explain the concept of a phylogenetic tree
The student will be able to describe the process of how a phylogenetic tree is constructed
The student will be able to identify the different types of phylogenetic trees and their uses
The student will be able to explain the importance of the molecular clock in the construction of a phylogenetic tree
The student will be able to describe the process of how a phylogenetic tree is used to estimate the time of divergence of species
